attributes.action: Sack Adam Crozier as the Chief Executive of Royal Mail, and put someone competent who has actually worked on the shop floor in his place, And also get the business back on an even keel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see Adam Crozier sacked from his position as the government appointed Chief Executive of Royal Mail, and replaced by a more down to earth person who is more competent. Get the company back on an even keel, where we're respected by the public, not ridiculed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
